speaker.whotheyare: Patricia Villarrubia-Gómez researches plastics pollution at global scale, addressing its impacts on Earth system processes, international policy and social movements.
speaker.whylisten: Patricia Villarrubia-Gómez is a PhD Candidate at the Stockholm Resilience Centre. Her work has gathered early evidence of the ways that plastic pollution has taken humanity outside Earth's safe operating space, as defined by the planetary boundaries framework.
